name: dev-kit-knowledge-curator
description: Capture repo best practices (snapshot) and/or session learnings into a knowledgebase. Use when the user asks for best practices, learn summaries, or knowledgebase updates.

sections.title: Knowledge Curator
lines: Purpose: Produce a reusable best-practices snapshot and/or capture session learnings in a knowledgebase.

sections.title: Config
bullets: Inputs are derived from the repo and environment when not provided explicitly.

sections.title: Logic
bullets: Analyze repo evidence sources (README, docs/, prompts, configs).
Draft a short outline for each output.
Session mode: append a dated section to `docs/knowledge.md`.

sections.title: Schema
bullets: Inputs: repo root, user request, evidence sources
Format: Markdown with dated section headers `## YYYY-MM-DD`

sections.title: Docs
bullets: Assets: (none; use repo-local guidance when present)
